Search Results for

    Edit this page

    Class AuPropertyGrid

    Namespace
    AetherUtils.Core.WinForms.Controls
    Assembly
    AetherUtils.Core.dll
    Represents a custom PropertyGrid control with support for additional buttons on the ToolStrip of the property grid. Each button can be added using the AddButton(string, ToolStripButton) method. When all buttons are added, DrawButtons() can be called to add them to the control.
    public class AuPropertyGrid : PropertyGrid, IDropTarget, ISynchronizeInvoke, IWin32Window, IBindableComponent, IComponent, IDisposable, IContainerControl, IComPropertyBrowser
    Inheritance

    Remarks

    A button can be retrieved using GetButton(string); this allows you to add an event handler to the button. Most commonly, an OnClick event handler should be added to a button.

    Constructors

    AuPropertyGrid(bool)

    Create a new property grid, specifying whether to hide the property page button by default.
    public AuPropertyGrid(bool hidePropertyPageButton)

    Parameters

    hidePropertyPageButton bool
    Should the property page button be hidden?

    AuPropertyGrid(IContainer) 

    public AuPropertyGrid(IContainer container)

    Parameters

    container IContainer

    AuPropertyGrid(IContainer, bool) 

    public AuPropertyGrid(IContainer container, bool hidePropertyPageButton)

    Parameters

    container IContainer
    hidePropertyPageButton bool

    Methods

    AddButton(string, ToolStripButton)

    Add a new button to the property grid with the specified key.
    public bool AddButton(string key, ToolStripButton button)

    Parameters

    key string
    A unique key to identify the button.
    button ToolStripButton
    The ToolStripButton to add.

    Returns

    bool
    true if the button was added; false otherwise.

    Dispose(bool)

    Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the PropertyGrid.
    protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)

    Parameters

    disposing bool
    true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

    DrawButtons()

    Draw the custom buttons on the property grid. This method should be called after adding or removing buttons from the property grid via AddButton(string, ToolStripButton) or RemoveButton(string).
    public void DrawButtons()

    GetButton(string)

    Get the button specified by the key.
    public ToolStripButton? GetButton(string key)

    Parameters

    key string
    The unique key of the button to get.

    Returns

    ToolStripButton

    RemoveButton(string)

    Remove the button specified by key from the property grid.
    public bool RemoveButton(string key)

    Parameters

    key string
    The unique key of the button to remove.

    Returns

    bool
    true if the button was removed; false otherwise.
